taskDescription: On a cruise ship, the uninfected population starts with 212 passengers. The infected population starts with 4 passengers.  Moreover, 26 passengers are infected each day.  Of the infected passengers, 2 die each day.  Construct a model that shows how both populations change daily.

givenModelNodes.name: Uninfected population
givenModelNodes.description: Number of people on the cruise ship without the infection

givenModelNodes.name: infected daily
givenModelNodes.description: Number of people who are infected each day

givenModelNodes.name: Infectedpopulation
givenModelNodes.description: Number of passengers who are infected and alive

givenModelNodes.name: die daily
givenModelNodes.description: Number of infected people who die each day
